3.1 Projects

3.1.1 Projects and libraries

A project represents a single Dylan library. Think of a project as something that gathers together all the information Functional Developer needs to be able to compile a particular library.

For example, earlier in this manual, we worked with the Reversi project. The Reversi project represents a single Dylan library, called Reversi.

Getting Started with Functional Developer - 31 MAR 2000
